text.text_translated:
Erik Weihenmayer is from the United States. He is an adventurer and does many different things. He rode a bike in the deserts of Morocco. He went in a small boat in the Grand Canyon. He also climbed Mount Everest.

This is amazing because Erik cannot see. This started when he was 13 years old.

He does more than travel. He helps other people who have problems with their bodies. He wants them to live active lives. He also takes young people who cannot see on climbing trips.
